Package com.wolvencraft.yasp

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataCollector
    Stores collected statistical data until it can be processed and sent to the database.
    This class is intended to be run in an asynchronous thread; all components are thread-safe.
    LocalSession
    Represents a user session for a tracked player.
    This object is destroyed if the player is online after the database synchronization.
    OfflineSession
    Represents a user session for a tracked player.
    The player may be offline, or not exist at all.
    PluginMetrics
    The metrics class obtains data about a plugin and submits statistics about it to the metrics backend.
    PluginMetrics.Graph
    Represents a custom graph on the website
    PluginMetrics.Plotter
    Interface used to collect custom data for a plugin
    Settings
    Data store that contains both local and remote plugin configurations
    Statistics  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandManager
    A sturdy implementation of a CommandManager focused on handling sub-commands.
    Additionally, stores the CommandSender for the duration of the command execution.
    Settings.ActiveHooks
    Represents modules that are currently active.
    Settings.ItemsWithMetadata
    A hard-coded list of items that have a metadata that should be tracked
    Settings.LocalConfiguration
    Represents the local configuration, stored in config.yml
    Settings.Modules  
    Settings.RemoteConfiguration
    Represents the configuration pulled from the database.
    No data is stored locally; all information is pulled from the database during runtime.
